channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Abandoned car for a long time, 24th October
item.description:
This CAR is abandoned by previous tenants of one of the Hamlet house flats. It hasn't been moved for over half a year. Our community tried to reach the owner but unsuccessfully. Car is not taxed or insured. Also inside is like a junk box.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Glenure Road, Well Hall, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ridiculously dangerous place to leave a lime bike, 24th October

item.title: Outside 32 Fitzroy Rd, 24th October
item.description:
There is a electrical cable hanging on a public wall, I reported this many times in the last few months and the cable is still there. Can be very dangerous especially when is a rainy day, I saw children and dogs playing around imagine they will touch that cable a tragedy can happen. I don't know where else to report this because nobody cares. An electric cable is hanging on a public wall. Please take action. Thanks 32 Fitzroy Rd
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 25, Fitzroy Road, Chalk Farm, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Illegal e-bike overtaking marked police unit. Wearing hood and black balacawa. Police officers do not react or take any enforcement knowing that it is an illegal ebike what can do speeds up to 70 mph. Police officers not enforcing the law. Police corruption. Tax payers money being wasted., 24th October
item.description:
Police corruption turning a blind eye to a legal e-blikes overtaking marked police unit at high speeds.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Chapman Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 32 Fitzroy Rd, 24th October
item.description:
Hi, there is an electric cable hanging out from a flat at 32 Fitzroy Rd my children played with this cable in the rain and I find out it was an electric cable , this is so dangerous how can you allow this happened?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 25, Fitzroy Road, Chalk Farm, London

item.title: Street light outside no. 6 Coptic Street., 24th October
item.description:
The street light outside no. 6 Coptic Street is still not working. An engineer fixed the street light outside no. 8 Coptic Street but the street light outside no. 6 remains broken. Please can you send an engineer to fix the street light outside no. 6 Coptic Street. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 36, Great Russell Street, Bloomsbury, London
